Pain_Field.help: This device recreates the insidious pain field used by the Circle of Thorns. Any foe in the area of effect will automatically suffer minor damage over time.
Pain_Field.targetHelp: Your health is being drained away.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Special damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Special damage.

Force_Field.help: Through a rift to the Shadow Shard, this device creates a shell of energy that protects all within it.

Stealth_Suppression_Field.help: This artifact calls on the deities of speed to curse all who enter it. Those in the area of effect have their speed and attack rate reduced.

Weakness_Field.help: Modifying the spells of the Circle of Thorns, arcane masters have created the weakness field. Foes in the area of effect have their health and endurance regeneration reduced.
Weakness_Field.targetHelp: You feel weakened. Your healing rate and recovery rate are reduced.

Pain_Field.help: The Pain Field is an extreme countermeasure for situations where non-lethal measures are not enough. Pulsing waves of energy cause damage over time to enemies within radius of the generator, making the pain field an ideal area denial and supplemental defense system.
Pain_Field.targetHelp: Your health is being drained away.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Special damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Special damage.

Force_Field.help: When armor plating and resistant materials are not enough to protect your valuable equipment, a High-Energy Force Shield is just the thing. Designed for use in hostile environments and able to withstand full combat conditions, this force shield is the perfect supplement to any items defenses.

Stealth_Suppression_Field.help: Troubled by super-stealthed thieves? This high-tech package can not only note the presence of invisible, stealthed, and otherwise hard-to-detect intruders, it also creates a powerful field that suppresses these powers. This field is non-toxic and certified safe for use in all situations, making it ideal for your access screening needs.

Weakness_Field.help: The Weakness Field provides a practical alternative to lethal counter-measures. A combination of sub-sonics and focused energy pulses disrupts bio systems, effectively slowing health and stamina recovery.
Weakness_Field.targetHelp: You feel weakened. Your healing rate and recovery rate are reduced.

Explode.help: When Turrets are destroyed, they tend to explode, but deal no damage.
